description.content: The Authorize API performs a credit card authorization request using a credit card token to insure the credit card is valid and has the requested credit limit available.  The authorization code is returned on success and error information if not successful.  The Capture API will then need to be called to actually request the funds transfer.

 1. EnableInquiryForADay - This flag needs to be turned on to allow inquiries for transactions from the last 24 hours only.

description.content: The TransactionHistory download API can report all payment transactions that have occurred on the SnapPay portal.  Based on account configuration, this can include payments on the EIPP portal, as well as through the interoperability APIs.  Payment information includes invoice details for a complete picture of the intended accounting of the payment. New payments since the last time the API was called are returned by default.  This allows calling the API multiple times during the day and being assured that only transactions you have not already received will be returned.  If a date range is provided, all transactions within that range will be reported each time the API is called.

query.description: The beginning of the date range for fetching records/transactions
The end of the date range for fetching records/transactions
CC or ACH or All or empty
SendLink or Order or Invoice or empty
A or S or D or V or empty

description.content: The bin API allows you to use a CardConnect CardSecure token to determine what type of payment card is being used. The first six (6) digits of a credit card are known as the Bank Identifier Number (BIN), also known as an Issuer Identification Number (IIN). This API is application only for CardConnect payment gateway.

description.content: The PaymentDataUpload API can upload all payment transactions that have occurred outside the SnapPay portal. Depending on account configuration, this can include payments made through ERP systems like JDE, Oracle, SAP, and other portals, as well as through interoperability APIs. Payment information includes invoice details, providing a complete picture of the intended accounting for the payment.

query.description: (Required) The Merchant ID associated with the stored profiles or accounts. The merchant account must be enrolled in the Card Account Updater service.
The number of days prior to the current date, used to retrieve updates reported within that period. Defaults to 30 if not provided.
The number of the page being requested. Defaults to 1 if not provided.
A true or false value where true returns the Bank Identification Number (BIN) information when an update record for the account includes a new card number. Defaults to false if not provided.

description.content: The PutUpdater request enrolls accounts in the Card Account Updater service manually, by supplying tokens. These accounts are monitored for changes in account status, expiry, or card number. Card Account Updater relies on information provided by Visa, Mastercard, and Discover to determine when a change has occurred, and stores the changes for retrieval using the GET method.

description.content: Digitally transform your payment process with certified ERP integration to improve working capital and increase efficiencies. SnapPay from Fiserv, integrates with popular ERP solutions and shopping cart solutions to serve the holistic B2B payment needs of enterprise-size businesses.
